###### Thank you for a wonderful 2024 edition of Feast of the Seven Fishes! 

###### We are now resting and enjoying time with our loved ones for our holiday closure. We're back January 3!

###### There is lots in store at Caf√© Mars in 2025, so follow along here and on IG: **[@cafemarsbk](https://www.instagram.com/cafemarsbk/?hl=en "@cafemarsbk")**!
